resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
paleolimbot opened a new pull request, #14530:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14530

   After ARROW-17187 (#14271), we get at least two nightly build failures because of how cpp11 objects are constructed in some new test functions. This PR makes the constructors less ambiguous so that no compilers give us trouble!

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14530:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14530#issuecomment-1293503381

   https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18174

fields.description:
After ARROW-17187, we get at least one nightly build failure because of how cpp11 objects are constructed in some new test functions:

https://dev.azure.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=38446&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=d9b15392-e4ce-5e4c-0c8c-b69645229181&l=2242
